title: How do I Filter Patient Education?
body:
Follow these steps to Filter Patient Education:
Navigate to Resources (click More -> Resources)
Make sure you are in the "Patient Education" section
Click Filter to reveal a drop-down list
Click to select a filter under Scope, Status or Publisher, or a combination of all three
The list of patient education resources has now been filtered
NOTE: Scope = Level the resource is shared at
i.e:
Private: Only the documents creator can view and use this resource
Practice: Anyone within the document creator's practice can view and use this resource; Only the creator can make amendments to the original template.
Community: Accessible to ALL MediRecords users; Only the creator can make amendments to the original template.
Please click here if you would like to know How to View Patient Education
